attributes.action: Call the election before summer, so we can enjoy it without this madness
attributes.background: The government is procrastinating. Rishi Sunak is refraining from calling the election. We are tired of the Tories and want to enjoy our summer without the burden of this government. The government serves the people, it is clear that the Tories cannot govern. It should be put to vote immediately.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658173
